text: I got an air fryer and had a chance to try it on a rib-eye steak yesterday, and omg it was sooo good. It took six minutes to cook, and then a few minutes to "rest" and it was as delicious as a steak off the grill, but without any of the work. I got the "budget pick" recommended by Wirecutter. It's easy to use, just plug it in and press some buttons. Not sure what I'll use the toaster oven for now.
